name: SFSpeechRecognitionResult
desc: An object that contains the partial or final results of a speech recognition request.

items.name: var bestTranscription: SFTranscription
items.desc: The transcription with the highest confidence level.

items.name: var transcriptions: [SFTranscription]
items.desc: An array of potential transcriptions, sorted in descending order of confidence.

items.name: var speechRecognitionMetadata: SFSpeechRecognitionMetadata?
items.desc: An object that contains the metadata results for a speech recognition request.

items.name: var isFinal: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether speech recognition is complete and whether the transcriptions are final.
